DOC.brief_title: Effect Coadministration Ume Paste ( Prunus Mume ) Ginger Powder
DOC.criteria: Fasting plasma glucose 105125 mg/dL Taking antidiabetic drug Taking drug functional food may affect blood glucose level Pregnant nursing child Participation clinical trial within 90 day commencement trial Renal hepatic dysfunction Heart disease History severe disease and/or major surgery
